404.title: You have found a secret place.
404.description: Unfortunately, this is only a 404 page. You may have mistyped the address, or the page has been moved to another URL.
404.link: Take me back to the landing page.

Landing.description: AI TTS Donations is a free and Open Source AI TTS service for Twitch (and other platforms). It's the first of its class, no subscription services, no additional add-ons, and no ads.
Landing.getStartedTooltip: We aren't ready yet! Sign up to the mailing list below.
Landing.getStartedToday: Sounds good? Get started with AI TTS Donations today for free!
Landing.emailSignUp: Sign up to the mailing list!
Landing.emailNotReadyDescription: We aren't ready to launch yet, but you can sign up to the mailing list to get notified when we are.

Dashboard.sensitiveInfo: Sensitive Information (DO NOT OPEN ON STREAM.)
Dashboard.sensitiveInfoWarning: WARNING: DO NOT SHOW OVERLAY LINK ON STREAM. IT CONTAINS SENSITIVE INFORMATION.
Dashboard.ttsOverlayDescription: This is where your TTS audio will be playing, simply copy the link, and paste it into a Browser Source in your preferred streaming software (like OBS).
